question: 硬直
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>stiff</kanji> <kanji>fix</kanji> is when you fix something to be stiff, which leads to <vocabulary>rigidity</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>stiffness</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>stiffening</vocabulary>. This word feels pretty formal when used as a noun. You can also add <ja>している</ja> or <ja>した</ja> to mean "rigid," but it doesn't mean that on its own.
